Research Actvities and Supervised Theses

Our current and past research projects as well as some selected supervised theses

Home News Research Publications Collaborations Team

Research Projects

The research group was or is involved in the following past and ongoing projects:

  • BrAIght - Human-Centred AI for efficient operations
  • AI4REALNET - AI for Real-world Network operation
  • Meteoblue - High-Resolution Urban Climate
  • Wisk - Vertiport Simulation for Urban Air Mobility
  • City of Zurich - Pollutant emissions at different speed limits
  • Airline Profitability - Comprehensive Understanding of Profit Cycles in the Airline Industry
  • Swiss Post - Development of a Digital Twin for optimized parcel logistics
